featured.text: Raised in California, Whitfield began performing in public at age 18, when she took a job as a singing waitress at a pizza parlor.
What is the job of an angelfish in the sea? (A) Being a cleaner for other fish.
But it’s the parents’ job to serve a variety of foods and expose their children to healthy dieting habits.
Recently, new models have been introduced and accessories added to meet the needs of laborers working on various job sites.
There are reports of discrimination leading to children being bullied, ending of happy relationships, and loss of job opportunities due to blood type.

other.text: Maria didn’t want to deliver the bad news to David about his failing the job interview.
The result is an unfortunate tendency for people making initial contact—in a job interview, for example—to stare fixedly at the other individual.
To help Abate continue running, the coach arranged a motel job for him, which pays $9 a month.
The manager ______ without hesitation after he had been offered a better job in another company.
In a job interview, attitude and personality are usually important _____ that influence the decision of the interviewers.
The young generation in this country has shown less interest in factory work and other _____ labor jobs, such as house construction and fruit picking.
Marine pilotage is a job that requires a high degree of proficiency as well as quick and independent thinking.
Besides, I remember telling you I used to have two part-time jobs when I was in college just to 19 .

I was sternly criticized for having such an idiotic job, and for the rest of the evening there was general jolly conversation—spoilt only by the fact that I had to take a telephone call in another room, which unfortunately lasted some time.
Obviously, a physically 22 person with an outdoor job under the sun will need to drink more fluid than a desk-bound person who lives and works in an air-conditioned place.
Which of the four jobs might be more suitable for her? 4.
Which job has the best benefits in addition to the regular salary? 3.
Which of the four jobs should he apply for? 5.
Although Jeffery had to keep two part-time jobs to support his family, he never ______ his studies.

When you begin a new job in an office, E.…make your message brief.
So, if you need money now, you should try either finding a job or cutting down on your 20 .

definition.en_def: A paid position of regular employment.
definition.example: She found a new job as a graphic designer.
